trans-unit.source: Provides the type converter for the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log"></xref> property.
<xref:System.Diagnostics.Design.LogConverter> converts object references to and from other representations.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Design.LogConverter"></xref> class for the given type.
Indicates whether this converter can convert an object of the given type to the type of this converter, using the specified context.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A T:System.Type that represents the type you want to convert from.
`true` if the conversion can be performed; otherwise, `false`.
Converts the given object to a string, using the specified context and culture information.
An T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext that provides a format context.
The T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo to use as the current culture.
The T:System.Object to convert
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that represents the converted value.
Gets a collection of standard values for the data type this validator is designed for.
The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
This can be `null`, so always check.
Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection"></xref> that holds a standard set of valid values, or `null` if the data type does not support a standard set of values.
Indicates whether this object supports a standard set of values that can be picked from a list using the specified context.
The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
This can be `null`, so always check.
Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
`true` because <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues"></xref> should be called to find a common set of values the object supports.
This method never returns `false`.
